<h1 align="center">
  A recipe app powered by Gatsby and Contentful
</h1>


# What's happening here?

This is a recipe SPA created using Gatsby and pulling in data from Contentful using GraphQL. Users can view recipes by tags or the dedicated recipe page which loops through the data from Contenful. Contact form is validated using Formspree. The site is full responsive with images optimized using the Gatsby image plugin and react-helmet is used for SEO visibility
